page.title: 06RAINBOW FUCHSIAS (CONT)
page.content: In the garden there is a big fish pond with two filter beds. There is a net over the pond to keep out the birds and cats. At the nursery, about three people work there and they enjoy their work very much. One of them has worked there for five years. They do not plant seeds when they need new plants they use cuttings from the bigger plants. This is what they do, they take off the two bottom leaves and then snip beneath the node and put them into larger pots so that they have more root space to grow.
